scripts.generate: nuxt generate && lftp -u dashboard@inicontent.com,azqswx784512 -e "rm -r _nuxt;quit" ftp.inicontent.com && ncftpput -u dashboard@inicontent.com -p azqswx784512 -R ftp.inicontent.com / .output/public/*
scripts.ftp: lftp -u dashboard@inicontent.com,azqswx784512 -e "rm -r _nuxt;quit" ftp.inicontent.com && ncftpput -u dashboard@inicontent.com -p azqswx784512 -R ftp.inicontent.com / .output/public/*
